verses.verse: לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> Thou shalt not raise שֵׁ֣מַע <S%H8088><s%> report שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> a false אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּ֤שֶׁת <S%H7896><s%> put יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> not thine hand עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with רָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked לִהְיֹ֖ת <S%H1961><s%> become עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> witness חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> to be an unrighteous ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become אַחֲרֵֽי־ <S%H310><s%> Thou shalt not follow רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> a multitude לְרָעֹ֑ת <S%H7451><s%> to [do] evil וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> neither shalt thou speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in רִ֗ב <S%H7379><s%> in a cause לִנְטֹ֛ת <S%H5186><s%> to decline אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> after רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> many לְהַטֹּֽת׃ <S%H5186><s%> to wrest
וְדָ֕ל <S%H1800><s%> a poor לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <S%H1921><s%> Neither shalt thou countenance בְּרִיבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7379><s%> man in his cause ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> If תִפְגַּ֞ע <S%H6293><s%> If thou meet שׁ֧וֹר <S%H7794><s%> ox אֹֽיִבְךָ֛ <S%H341><s%> thine enemy's א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חֲמֹר֖וֹ <S%H2543><s%> or his ass תֹּעֶ֑ה <S%H8582><s%> going astray הָשֵׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> thou shalt surely תְּשִׁיבֶ֖נּוּ <S%H7725><s%> to him again לֽוֹ׃ ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If תִרְאֶ֞ה <S%H7200><s%> If thou see חֲמ֣וֹר <S%H2543><s%> the ass שֹׂנַאֲךָ֗ <S%H8130><s%> of him that hateth רֹבֵץ֙ <S%H7257><s%> thee lying תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> under מַשָּׂא֔וֹ <S%H4853><s%> under his burden וְחָדַלְתָּ֖ <S%H2308><s%> and wouldest forbear מֵעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> to help ל֑וֹ עָזֹ֥ב <S%H5800><s%> him thou shalt surely תַּעֲזֹ֖ב <S%H5800><s%> help עִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with ס
לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַטֶּ֛ה <S%H5186><s%> Thou shalt not wrest מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> the judgment אֶבְיֹנְךָ֖ <S%H34><s%> of thy poor בְּרִיבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7379><s%> in his cause

מִדְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> matter שֶׁ֖קֶר <S%H8267><s%> from a false תִּרְחָ֑ק <S%H7368><s%> Keep thee far וְנָקִ֤י <S%H5355><s%> and the innocent וְצַדִּיק֙ <S%H6662><s%> and righteous אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּהֲרֹ֔ג <S%H2026><s%> slay כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I will not אַצְדִּ֖יק <S%H6663><s%> thou not for I will not justify רָשָֽׁע׃ <S%H7563><s%> the wicked

וְשֹׁ֖חַד <S%H7810><s%> no gift לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הַשֹּׁ֙חַד֙ <S%H7810><s%> for the gift יְעַוֵּ֣ר <S%H5786><s%> blindeth פִּקְחִ֔ים <S%H6493><s%> the wise וִֽיסַלֵּ֖ף <S%H5557><s%> and perverteth דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous

וְגֵ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> a stranger לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִלְחָ֑ץ <S%H3905><s%> Also thou shalt not oppress וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you יְדַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H3045><s%> for ye know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the heart הַגֵּ֔ר <S%H1616><s%> of a stranger כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> seeing גֵרִ֥ים <S%H1616><s%> ye were strangers הֱיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> And six שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years תִּזְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> thou shalt sow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> thy land וְאָסַפְתָּ֖ <S%H622><s%> and shalt gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּבוּאָתָֽהּ׃ <S%H8393><s%> in the fruits

וְהַשְּׁבִיעִ֞ת <S%H7637><s%> But the seventh תִּשְׁמְטֶ֣נָּה <S%H8058><s%> [year] thou shalt let it rest וּנְטַשְׁתָּ֗הּ <S%H5203><s%> and lie וְאָֽכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> may eat אֶבְיֹנֵ֣י <S%H34><s%> still that the poor עַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְיִתְרָ֕ם <S%H3499><s%> and what they leave תֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> shall eat חַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field כֵּֽן־ <S%H3651><s%> the same תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> In like manner thou shalt deal לְכַרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> with thy vineyard לְזֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2132><s%> [and] with thy oliveyard

שֵׁ֤שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt do מַעֲשֶׂ֔יךָ <S%H4639><s%> thy work וּבַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֖י <S%H7637><s%> and on the seventh תִּשְׁבֹּ֑ת <S%H7673><s%> thou shalt rest לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יָנ֗וּחַ <S%H5117><s%> may rest שֽׁוֹרְךָ֙ <S%H7794><s%> that thine ox וַחֲמֹרֶ֔ךָ <S%H2543><s%> and thine ass וְיִנָּפֵ֥שׁ <S%H5314><s%> may be refreshed בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> and the son אֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H519><s%> of thy handmaid וְהַגֵּֽר׃ <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger

וּבְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which אָמַ֥רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> And in all [things] that I have said אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to you תִּשָּׁמֵ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> unto you be circumspect וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> of the name אֱלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> of other לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַזְכִּ֔ירוּ <S%H2142><s%> and make no mention לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> neither let it be heard עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> out פִּֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth
שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> Three רְגָלִ֔ים <S%H7272><s%> times תָּחֹ֥ג <S%H2287><s%> thou shalt keep a feast לִ֖י בַּשָּׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> unto me in the year

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חַ֣ג <S%H2282><s%> the feast הַמַּצּוֹת֮ <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread תִּשְׁמֹר֒ <S%H8104><s%> Thou shalt keep שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִים֩ <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּאכַ֨ל <S%H398><s%> (thou shalt eat מַצּ֜וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> I צִוִּיתִ֗ךָ <S%H6680><s%> as I commanded לְמוֹעֵד֙ <S%H4150><s%> thee in the time appointed חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month הָֽאָבִ֔יב <S%H24><s%> Abib כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ב֖וֹ יָצָ֣אתָ <S%H3318><s%> for in it thou camest out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> from Egypt וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and none יֵרָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> and none shall appear פָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> empty-handed

וְחַ֤ג <S%H2282><s%> And the feast הַקָּצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> of harvest בִּכּוּרֵ֣י <S%H1061><s%> the firstfruits מַעֲשֶׂ֔יךָ <S%H4639><s%> of thy labours אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תִּזְרַ֖ע <S%H2232><s%> which thou hast sown בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וְחַ֤ג <S%H2282><s%> and the feast הָֽאָסִף֙ <S%H614><s%> of ingathering בְּצֵ֣את <S%H3318><s%> [which is] in the end הַשָּׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> of the year בְּאָסְפְּךָ֥ <S%H622><s%> when thou hast gathered אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֶׂ֖יךָ <S%H4639><s%> in thy labours מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> out of the field

שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> Three פְּעָמִ֖ים <S%H6471><s%> times בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> in the year יֵרָאֶה֙ <S%H7200><s%> shall appear כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זְכ֣וּרְךָ֔ <S%H2138><s%> all thy males אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאָדֹ֥ן ׀ <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> Thou shalt not offer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with חָמֵ֖ץ <S%H2557><s%> with leavened bread דַּם־ <S%H1818><s%> the blood זִבְחִ֑י <S%H2077><s%> of my sacrifice וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> remain חֵֽלֶב־ <S%H2459><s%> neither shall the fat חַגִּ֖י <S%H2282><s%> of my sacrifice עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> until the morning

רֵאשִׁ֗ית <S%H7225><s%> The first בִּכּוּרֵי֙ <S%H1061><s%> of the firstfruits אַדְמָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H127><s%> of thy land תָּבִ֕יא <S%H935><s%> thou shalt bring בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H1310><s%> Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <S%H1423><s%> a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <S%H2461><s%> milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> in his mother's ס

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I שֹׁלֵ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> Behold I send מַלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> an Angel לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before לִשְׁמָרְךָ֖ <S%H8104><s%> thee to keep בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> thee in the way וְלַהֲבִ֣יאֲךָ֔ <S%H935><s%> and to bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> thee into the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which הֲכִנֹֽתִי׃ <S%H3559><s%> which I have prepared

הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Beware מִפָּנָ֛יו <S%H6440><s%> of וּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> him and obey בְּקֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּמֵּ֣ר <S%H4843><s%> provoke בּ֑וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִשָּׂא֙ <S%H5375><s%> him not for he will not pardon לְפִשְׁעֲכֶ֔ם <S%H6588><s%> your transgressions כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> since שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> for my name בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> [is] in him

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> But אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> But if thou shalt indeed תִּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and do כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> i אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> all that I speak וְאָֽיַבְתִּי֙ <S%H341><s%> unto thine enemies אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <S%H340><s%> then I will be an enemy וְצַרְתִּ֖י <S%H6696><s%> unto thine adversaries אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹרְרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6887><s%> and an adversary

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יֵלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go מַלְאָכִי֮ <S%H4397><s%> For mine Angel לְפָנֶיךָ֒ <S%H6440><s%> before וֶהֱבִֽיאֲךָ֗ <S%H935><s%> thee and bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <S%H567><s%> thee in unto the Amorites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְהַפְּרִזִּי֙ <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> and the Canaanites הַחִוִּ֖י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites וְהִכְחַדְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H3582><s%> and I will cut them off

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֤ה <S%H7812><s%> Thou shalt not bow down לֵאלֹֽהֵיהֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> to their gods וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָֽעָבְדֵ֔ם <S%H5647><s%> nor serve וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> them nor do כְּמַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <S%H4639><s%> after their works כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הָרֵס֙ <S%H2040><s%> but thou shalt utterly תְּהָ֣רְסֵ֔ם <S%H2040><s%> overthrow וְשַׁבֵּ֥ר <S%H7665><s%> them and quite תְּשַׁבֵּ֖ר <S%H7665><s%> break down מַצֵּבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4676><s%> their images

וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֗ם <S%H5647><s%> And ye shall serve אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וּבֵרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> and he shall bless אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> לַחְמְךָ֖ <S%H3899><s%> thy bread וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵימֶ֑יךָ <S%H4325><s%> and thy water וַהֲסִרֹתִ֥י <S%H5493><s%> away מַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H4245><s%> sickness מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from the midst

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall be no תִהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become מְשַׁכֵּלָ֥ה <S%H7921><s%> There shall nothing cast their young וַעֲקָרָ֖ה <S%H6135><s%> nor be barren בְּאַרְצֶ֑ךָ <S%H776><s%> in thy land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִסְפַּ֥ר <S%H4557><s%> the number יָמֶ֖יךָ <S%H3117><s%> of thy days אֲמַלֵּֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> I will fulfil

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵֽימָתִי֙ <S%H367><s%> my fear אֲשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> I will send לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְהַמֹּתִי֙ <S%H2000><s%> thee and will destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom תָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> to whom thou shalt come בָּהֶ֑ם וְנָתַתִּ֧י <S%H5414><s%> and I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבֶ֛יךָ <S%H341><s%> all thine enemies אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> to עֹֽרֶף׃ <S%H6203><s%> turn their backs

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֥י <S%H7971><s%> And I will send אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצִּרְעָ֖ה <S%H6880><s%> hornets לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before וְגֵרְשָׁ֗ה <S%H1644><s%> thee which shall drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִוִּ֧י <S%H2340><s%> the Hivite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִתִּ֖י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittite מִלְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before

לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֲגָרְשֶׁ֛נּוּ <S%H1644><s%> I will not drive them out מִפָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before בְּשָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> thee in one פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> may not תִּהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> lest the land שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> become desolate וְרַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> multiply עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> too חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> and the beast הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

מְעַ֥ט <S%H4592><s%> By little מְעַ֛ט <S%H4592><s%> and little אֲגָרְשֶׁ֖נּוּ <S%H1644><s%> I will drive them out מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> from before עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תִּפְרֶ֔ה <S%H6509><s%> thee until thou be increased וְנָחַלְתָּ֖ <S%H5157><s%> and inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land
